import Mathlib

open Topology MvPolynomial Filter Set

abbrev putnam_2009_a3_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- 0
/--
Let $d_n$ be the determinant of the $n \times n$ matrix whose entries, from left to right and then from top to bottom, are $\cos 1, \cos 2, \dots, \cos n^2$. (For example,\[ d_3 = \left|\begin{matrix} \cos 1 & \cos 2 & \cos 3 \\ \cos 4 & \cos 5 & \cos 6 \\  \cos 7 & \cos 8 & \cos 9 \end{matrix} \right|. \]The argument of $\cos$ is always in radians, not degrees.) Evaluate $\lim_{n\to\infty} d_n$.
-/
theorem putnam_2009_a3
(cos_matrix : (n : ℕ) → Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)
(hM : ∀ n : ℕ, ∀ i j : Fin n, (cos_matrix n) i j = Real.cos (1 + n * i + j))
: Tendsto (fun n => (cos_matrix n).det) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2009_a3_solution) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2009_a3
(cos_matrix : (n : ℕ) → Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)
(hM : ∀ n : ℕ, ∀ i j : Fin n, (cos_matrix n) i j = Real.cos (1 + n * i + j))
: Tendsto (fun n => (cos_matrix n).det) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2009_a3_solution) := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n : ℕ, (cos_matrix n).det = 0 := by
    intro n
    have h₂ : (cos_matrix n).det = 0 := by
      rw [Matrix.det_eq_zero_of_column_eq_zero 0]
      intro i
      simp [hM, mul_comm]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
      <;> simp_all [Real.cos_eq_zero_iff]
      <;> use 0
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
      <;> linarith
    exact h₂
  simp_all [tendsto_const_nhds]
  <;> aesop
```

```lean4
import Mathlib

open Topology MvPolynomial Filter Set

abbrev putnam_2009_a3_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- 0
/--
Let $d_n$ be the determinant of the $n \times n$ matrix whose entries, from left to right and then from top to bottom, are $\cos 1, \cos 2, \dots, \cos n^2$. (For example,\[ d_3 = \left|\begin{matrix} \cos 1 & \cos 2 & \cos 3 \\ \cos 4 & \cos 5 & \cos 6 \\  \cos 7 & \cos 8 & \cos 9 \end{matrix} \right|. \]The argument of $\cos$ is always in radians, not degrees.) Evaluate $\lim_{n\to\infty} d_n$.
-/
theorem putnam_2009_a3
(cos_matrix : (n : ℕ) → Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)
(hM : ∀ n : ℕ, ∀ i j : Fin n, (cos_matrix n) i j = Real.cos (1 + n * i + j))
: Tendsto (fun n => (cos_matrix n).det) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2009_a3_solution) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2009_a3
(cos_matrix : (n : ℕ) → Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)
(hM : ∀ n : ℕ, ∀ i j : Fin n, (cos_matrix n) i j = Real.cos (1 + n * i + j))
: Tendsto (fun n => (cos_matrix n).det) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2009_a3_solution) := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n : ℕ, (cos_matrix n).det = 0 := by
    intro n
    have h₁ : (cos_matrix n).det = 0 := by
      rw [Matrix.det_eq_zero_of_column_eq_zero 0]
      intro i
      simp [hM, add_comm]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
      <;> field_simp [Real.cos_add, Real.cos_sub, Real.sin_add, Real.sin_sub]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
      <;> simp_all [Fin.val_zero]
      <;> linarith
    exact h₁
  simp_all
  <;> exact tendsto_const_nhds
```

    have h₂ : (cos_matrix n).det = 0 := by
      rw [Matrix.det_eq_zero_of_column_eq_zero 0]
      intro i
      simp [hM, Fin.val_zero]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
      <;> simp_all [Real.cos_eq_zero_iff]
      <;> use 0
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
    exact h₂
  simp_all [tendsto_const_nhds]
  <;> aesop
```
